intro:
STEAL THIS SHOW is a collaboration between TorrentFreak  and STEAL THIS FILM‘s Jamie King. For more than a decade, TorrentFreak has covered the latest in filesharing and copyright news.

We wanted a way to discuss the kind of news covered on TorrentFreak with some thought-leaders, innovators and friends. 

Website: http://stealthisshow.com/

post.body: Hi ZeroMEians! If you enjoy audio Podcasts that discuss fringe technologies & topics then be sure to check out our latest episode   ‘The Nerd Reich’, with Vinay Gupta  @ https://stealthisshow.com/s03e11/

comment.body:
It's Dec 6th and I took a look at your site.  While I can see the '/uimedia/master.css' line in your index.html, there isn't any such directory or file that currently exists by that name and hence the problem.

When I publish my sites, I try to push a few copies into a few zeronet proxies. There's like 2 functional ones available. Then after I do a few updates be sure to do the python zeronet.py siteSign command to sign the changes and a python zeronet.py sitePublish one to two times will get everything propagated throughout the network.

Hope that helps and hope to see your site up & running with style. :)
